document_title: Erectile dysfunction: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Erectile dysfunction is a condition in which the penis is not hard enough or unable to maintain an erection to fully perform satisfactory sexual activity. This condition is one of the manifestations of erectile dysfunction in men. (first)
Erection phenomenon is an extremely complex physiological process, with the participation of the nervous, mental, endocrine systems, blood vessels, structure of the penis... to bring more blood to the corpora cavernosa for erection. hard object. Therefore, any obstacle in this process, even the smallest, at the molecular level can cause erectile dysfunction.
Therefore, erectile dysfunction can be caused by one or a combination of many different causes. The five main causes of erectile dysfunction are: hormonal, neurological, mental, penile vascular system and abnormalities in penile structure. In addition, pelvic and genital trauma and medication are also common causes.
There are 2 types of erectile dysfunction:
Primary erectile dysfunction: is a patient who has never achieved or maintained a penile erection.; Secondary erectile dysfunction: the patient's penis is normally erect, but at some point it does not reach the desired hardness.
